attributes.review: Ego too big. Terrible, all around awful, negative energy, -4/10 Thoroughly ashamed, he thought he did something. The app proves itself how poorly it’s ranked, seen as when you type “Trump” into the App Store it doesn’t even come up.😡
attributes.title: Made my carrots disappear😡

attributes.review: I got this app and everything was going totally fine when I remembered something. I’m a liberal. Oh yea, and a self respecting human who would never support this racist, homophobic, sexist rapist of a human who somehow got to be America’s president. Would not recommend. Wish I could give 0 stars.
attributes.title: Liberal Mix Up

attributes.review: when i immediately opened the app, i had a very nauseous feeling 🤢 “make america great again” ? more like “make me wanna puke again”. like c’mon, this app is FULL of crashes n bugs. not worth your time. it also makes you PHYSICALLY SICK to your stomach. do not recommend!!!! obama would never 🥰💅🏻🧚🏻💋
attributes.title: MAKES ME WANNA VOMMIT!!!!!🤡👺🤢👁

attributes.review: The first time I opened this app it tried to kiss me. Also, since downloading it, my phone is acting weird and occasionally, Siri hollers out random racial slurs for no reason (awkward!). I’ve lost all my friends. My dog won’t even come to me anymore. This app ruined my life.
attributes.title: Save yourself!

attributes.review: Make Apps Great Again. Unfortunately this app is not the one 😞 smh. I had so much hope for this app but was disappointed when I found out it was only about trump (yuck) I would like a whole refund on the data it cost me to download. Dont forget to not vote for Kanye!!?
attributes.title: MAGA

attributes.review: I really hate this app it makes you fill out a whole bunch of information That’s unnecessary it also took so long to download that the gta 5 loading screen could be done after i downloaded it.
attributes.title: The worst app

attributes.review: To think it would be a great app, because that boy has millions of dollars to spend, but no. It was glitchy and kept getting bad. 10/10 do not recommend. I suggest to download COD. You will have a better experience that this.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: When I download it, it was so slow! Like my WiFi was ok but the app kept on loading for ages  and ages I couldn’t even do anything besides wait and my parents got mad because I didn’t do my chores because I was waiting for the app to load 😡
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: This app is disgustingly bad literally I’ve heard they take your information without your consent and share it with foreign tech companies .As well as target ads by invading your data it’s a breach to the country and should be deleted immediately
attributes.title: Disgustingly bad

attributes.review: Smelt a little racist to me when I downloaded it. Thought it was way to straight forward when it asked for my phone number. Also could have used a more attractive spokes model. Maybe a women next time? Maybe joe Biden?
attributes.title: Horrible horrible app
